mapper.select: /* approval-mail.findApprovalInfo */ SELECT APVL.TEN_ID , APVL.APVL_UUID , APVL.APVL_TYP_CCD , APVL.APVL_DOCNO , APVL.APVL_REVNO , APVL.APVL_TIT , APVL.APVL_RPTG_DTTM , APVL.APVL_STS_CCD , APVL.APVL_RES_CCD , APVL.FNL_APVL_DTTM , APVL.ATHG_UUID , APVL.STS , APVL.REGR_ID , APVL.REG_DTTM , APVL.MODR_ID , APVL.MOD_DTTM , USR.USR_NM , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN USR.USR_NM_EN ELSE USR.USR_NM END AS DISP_USR_NM FROM APVL APVL LEFT OUTER JOIN USR USR ON APVL.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND APVL.REGR_ID = USR.USR_ID WHERE APVL.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND APVL.APVL_UUID = #{p.apvl_uuid}

SELECT APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.APVL_DTTM , APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.APVL_OPN , CASE WHEN #{g.locale} = 'en_US' THEN USR.USR_NM_EN ELSE USR.USR_NM END AS AGREE_RET_NAME FROM APVL INNER JOIN APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS ON APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.TEN_ID = APVL.TEN_ID AND APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.APVL_UUID = APVL.APVL_UUID INNER JOIN USR ON USR.TEN_ID = APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.TEN_ID AND USR.USR_ID = APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.USR_ID WHERE APVL.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND APVL.APVL_UUID = #{p.apvl_uuid} AND APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.APVLLN_APVL_RES_CCD = 'RET'

SELECT 'To' AS RECIPIENTTYPE , USR.EML AS ADDRESS , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN USR.USR_NM_EN ELSE USR.USR_NM END AS NAME , USR.USR_ID AS ID FROM APVL INNER JOIN APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS ON APVL.TEN_ID = APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.TEN_ID AND APVL.APVL_UUID = APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.APVL_UUID INNER JOIN USR ON USR.TEN_ID = APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.TEN_ID AND USR.USR_ID = APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.USR_ID WHERE APVL.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND APVL.APVL_UUID = #{p.apvl_uuid} AND APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.APVR_TYP_CCD = 'DFT'

SELECT 'To' AS RECIPIENTTYPE , USR.EML AS ADDRESS , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN USR.USR_NM_EN ELSE USR.USR_NM END AS NAME , USR.USR_ID AS ID FROM APVL INNER JOIN APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS ON APVL.TEN_ID = APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.TEN_ID AND APVL.APVL_UUID = APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.APVL_UUID INNER JOIN USR ON USR.TEN_ID = APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.TEN_ID AND USR.USR_ID = APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.USR_ID WHERE APVL.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND APVL.APVL_UUID = #{p.apvl_uuid} AND APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.APVLLN_SORT = #{p.apvlln_sort} AND APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS.APVLLN_APVL_RES_CCD = 'WTG'
